body:
Hi James,


Your reply-to was fine, this thread started in -general. As to your
problem, I will pass this along to the Kitware guys to try and find a fix.
You are the first person to test this on Solaris for us, so thanks much!


Greg, I am getting a release Windows build posted to the site today, and
would like to at least address those two user questions in -general. But
yeah I agree, after that, we should move these discussions to -dev.




Rob Guglielmetti  IESNA, LEED AP
Commercial Buildings Research Group
National Renewable Energy Laboratory
15013 Denver West Parkway MS:RSF202
Golden, CO 80401
